events.message: We have successfully received the application for the software engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
The candidate’s application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on their experience and skill set.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate’s hiring process moving forward.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the candidate showed strong understanding of software development principles.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the initial screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm for the next steps.
We have scheduled the technical interview for the candidate to assess their coding and problem-solving skills in detail.
